source/maxent/ext_algorithm.hpp

00002  * vi:ts=4:tw=78:shiftwidth=4:expandtab
00003  * vim600:fdm=marker
00004  *
00005  * ext_algorithm.hpp  -  wrapper header as a workaround for several different ways
00006  * of using non-standard STL algorithms, since they are not in ISO standard.
00007  *
00008  * After inclusion of this file non-standard STL algorithms like
00009  * lexicographical_compare_3way are exported into the global namespace.
00010  *
00011  * Copyright (C) 2004 by Zhang Le <ejoy@users.sourceforge.net>

00021  *

00023  * all copies or substantial portions of the Software.

00026  * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
00027  * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL

00034 #ifndef EXT_ALGORITHM_HPP
00035 #define EXT_ALGORITHM_HPP
00036 
00037 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00038 #include <config.h>
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #if defined(_STLPORT_VERSION) || (defined (__GNUC__) && __GNUC__ <= 2)
00042     #include <algorithm>
00043     using std::copy_n;
00044     using std::lexicographical_compare_3way;
00045 #else 
00046     // not using STLPORT, not GCC 2.9x
00047     #if (defined(__GNUC__) && __GNUC__ >= 3)
00048         #include <ext/algorithm>
00049         using __gnu_cxx::copy_n;
00050         using __gnu_cxx::lexicographical_compare_3way;
00051     #elif defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1300) 
00052         // we only support MSVC7+
00053         // the following non-standard functions are modified from STLPORT
00054         // lexicographical_compare_3way
00055         template <class _InputIter1, class _InputIter2>
00056         int lexicographical_compare_3way(_InputIter1 __first1, _InputIter1 __last1,
00057                                            _InputIter2 __first2, _InputIter2 __last2)
00058         {
00059           while (__first1 != __last1 && __first2 != __last2) {
00060             if (*__first1 < *__first2)
00061               return -1;
00062             if (*__first2 < *__first1)
00063               return 1;
00064             ++__first1;
00065             ++__first2;
00066           }
00067           if (__first2 == __last2) {
00068             return !(__first1 == __last1);
00069           }
00070           else {
00071             return -1;
00072           }
00073         }
00074 
00075         // copy_n
00076         #include <utility>
00077         template <class _InputIter, class _Size, class _OutputIter>
00078         std::pair<_InputIter, _OutputIter> copy_n(_InputIter __first, _Size __count,
00079                                                _OutputIter __result) {
00080           for ( ; __count > 0; --__count) {
00081             *__result = *__first;
00082             ++__first;
00083             ++__result;
00084           }
00085           return std::pair<_InputIter, _OutputIter>(__first, __result);
00086         }
00087     #else 
00088         #error unknown compiler
00089     #endif // end GCC >= 3
00090 #endif // end STLPORT or GCC 2.9x
00091 
00092 #endif /* ifndef EXT_ALGORITHM_HPP */
